scripts.migration:create: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:create
scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:generate -d dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:run -d dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:revert -d dist/db/data-source.js
